title: Cllifton Chenier - Zydeco Party King 2009
description:
The undisputed Ã¢â‚¬ËœKing of Zydeco,Ã¢â‚¬â„¢ Clifton Chenier (1925-1987) was the first Creole to be presented a Grammy award on national television. Blending the French and Cajun 2-steps and waltzes of southwest Louisiana with New Orleans R&B, Texas blues, and big-band jazz, Chenier created the modern, dance-inspiring, sounds of zydeco. A flamboyant personality, remembered for his gold tooth and the cape and crown that he wore during concerts, Chenier set the standard for all the zydeco players who have followed in his footsteps. (allmusic.com)
